channel.title: Linux Machine on root@garlandwars:~#
channel.description: Recent content in Linux Machine on root@garlandwars:~#

item.title: Grandpa
item.description: Introduction This is a Linux Machine that is medium-ish(ly) difficult.It was uploaded by mrb3n. Prerequisites Some skills that would be handy in solving this box are Directory Busting Enumeration Linux cmdline Base64 encoding and decoding Tmux Scanning We start our scanning part with nmap nmap -A -p- -T4 -sC -Pn -oN nmap.txt -vv 10.10.10.79 nmap results for the above command Port 22,80,443 are only open.
